WhereIs_Command_Description: This command returns current location of specified user, IP and MAC address
WhereIs_Bot: The bot user account for Where Is
WhereIs_Bot_Description: Create a bot user and type his username here
WhereIs_Backend_Service_URL_Description: URL for REST API provided by WhereIs backend service
WhereIs_Backend_Service_Token: Token value for WhereIs backend service
WhereIs_Backend_Service_Token_Descriptio: Token value which will be used to secure connection between Rocket.Chat and WhereIs backend service
